description.default: A bustling place with a magnificent fountain in the center. Paths lead in all directions, and a stone well stands near the eastern corner.
description.storm: The square is desolate, pounded by rain. The fountain's spray is lost in the downpour. Paths lead in all directions, and a stone well stands near the eastern corner.
description.fog: The town square is wrapped in a thick, silent fog. The fountain is just a faint sound of splashing water nearby. Paths are barely visible in all directions.

objects.name: fountain
objects.description: The fountain depicts the Goddess of Wealth pouring endless gold into the city. Its water is cool and clear.

details.name: water
details.description: Looking closely at the water, you see a few copper coins glinting at the bottom.

objects.name: well
objects.description: A weathered stone well. You can see a dark, winding rope tied to the lip, leading down. You could probably **CLIMB** the rope.

description.default: You are in the southern part of the town square. The main square is to the north. The sturdy wooden door to the inn is here.

objects.name: door
objects.description: The sturdy wooden door to the inn. You could probably **ENTER** it.

description.default: It is dark and cramped down here. The air is damp and smells of mildew and wet fur. You notice some strange plants growing in the muck near the wall. Dark passages lead east and west.

objects.name: rope
objects.description: A thick, wet rope leads back up to the town square.

details.name: rope-fray
details.description: Upon closer inspection, you see the rope is badly frayed near the top, as if from a sharp edge. It might not hold forever.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: The damp, mildewy smell from the well intensifies here. The darkness is oppressive, and you hear a faint skittering noise from deeper in.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: The damp, mildewy smell from the well intensifies here. The darkness is oppressive, and you hear a faint skittering noise from deeper in.

objects.name: stirring monster
objects.description: A mass of shadows and wet fur, it huffs angrily.

description.default: You are in the northern part of the town square. The main square is to the south, and a large wooden gate blocks passage further north.

objects.name: wooden gate
objects.description: A tall, reinforced wooden gate. It looks like the main entrance to the town from the north. You could try to **ENTER** it.

description.default: You are in the eastern part of the town square. The main square is to the west. A set of tall, oaken doors stand here, open to the public.

objects.name: oaken doors
objects.description: Tall, oaken doors carved with symbols of light and healing. This is the entrance to the temple.

description.default: You are in the western part of the town square. The main square is to the east. A wide marble arch leads into the bank here.

objects.name: arch
objects.description: A grand marble arch, polished and imposing, serving as the entrance to the bank.

description.default: You are in the northeast corner of the town square. A small, rune-etched door is set into an alley here.

objects.name: rune-etched door
objects.description: This door is barred by a faint, shimmering field of energy. A small plaque reads: 'Elementalist's Study. Apprentices only.'

description.default: You are in the northwest corner of the town square. A solid oak door with an iron anvil sigil marks the armory.

objects.name: door
objects.description: A heavy oak door with a sigil of an anvil and hammer. This is the town armory.

description.default: You are in the southeast corner of the town square.
You are in the southwest corner of the town square. The door to a small furrier's shop is here, a crude sign of a pelt hanging above it.

objects.name: door
objects.description: A simple wooden door under a sign of a stretched pelt. This appears to be the furrier.

description.default: You are in a simple, comfortable room... You feel as though you just woke from a long, hazy dream...

objects.name: bed
objects.description: A simple straw mattress...

objects.name: window
objects.description: Looking out the window, you can see the bustling town square.

description.default: The small shop smells strongly of curing chemicals and animal musk. Pelts and claws of dubious origin are piled on a workbench. A grizzled furrier looks up as you enter.

objects.name: furrier
objects.description: A grizzled man skinning a small animal. He looks like he's seen better days.

description.default: You are in a grand lobby with a high, vaulted ceiling and a polished marble floor. A long counter of dark, polished wood dominates one wall.

objects.name: teller
objects.description: A sharply-dressed teller stands behind the counter, ready to assist you.

objects.name: counter
objects.description: A long, polished counter of dark wood.

description.default: The walls of this shop are lined with racks of basic weapons and armor. An armorer stands by a large anvil, wiping his brow.

objects.name: armorer
objects.description: A large, muscular man with soot on his face. He nods at you.

description.default: A quiet, peaceful temple. Incense burns softly in the air, and sunlight streams through a high, stained-glass window, illuminating a stone altar in the center of the room. A robed priest tends to several hurt patrons on cots.

objects.name: stone altar
objects.description: A simple, flat altar of white stone. It feels cold to the touch. This is where you awaken if you are slain.

objects.name: priest
objects.description: A kindly priest moves between cots, offering water and bandages. He looks tired and his supplies seem low. You could try to 'GIVE' him items or 'TALK TO' him.
objects.all_quests_done_message: The priest smiles warmly. 'You have learned all I can teach. Go with light, traveler.'

objects.name: hurt patron
objects.description: A citizen lying on a cot, groaning softly.

description.default: This small study is filled with crackling energy. Books line the walls and strange contraptions hiss and spark on a workbench. A stern-looking elementalist watches you enter.

objects.name: elementalist
objects.description: A stern-looking elementalist with crackling energy around their fingertips. They seem focused on their research. You could try to 'GIVE' them items or 'TALK TO' them.
objects.all_quests_done_message: The elementalist scoffs. 'I have no more time for apprentices. Be gone.'

description.default: You are just inside the northern gate of the town. The town square is to the south. A tall wooden gate leads north, out of the town.

objects.name: wooden gate
objects.description: A tall, reinforced wooden gate. You could **ENTER** it to leave the town.

description.default: You are just outside the northern gate of the town. A dirt path leads north into the forest. A stern guardsman watches all who approach the gate.

objects.name: wooden gate
objects.description: A tall, reinforced wooden gate. You could **ENTER** it to get back into town.

objects.name: a stern guardsman
objects.description: A stern guardsman in polished chainmail, holding a spear. He watches the forest path intently.

description.default: A rough path opens into a small clearing. The trees are thicker here, and a crude campfire smolders in the center. A path continues east.

objects.name: an orc
objects.description: A brutish, green-skinned humanoid. It sharpens a crude axe and watches you.

description.default: The clearing here is muddy and smells of stale meat. Several crude tents are pitched, and a couple of orcs grunt at each other over a pile of bones.

objects.name: an orc
objects.description: A brutish, green-skinned humanoid. It sharpens a crude axe and watches you.

objects.name: an orc
objects.description: A brutish, green-skinned humanoid. It sharpens a crude axe and watches you.
